String.string: Stick with It
"Popori...? Lime! Right, I'll get some lime."
Talk to Keezar.
"All right."
Collect lime deposits around Hina Hot Springs.
Bring lime deposits to Keezar.
"Is he as crazy as you are?"
Ask Keezar how long it will take.
Making Stick-It-All
Show Keezar's memo to her right hand man.
"That's all?"
Spirit's Tear
Kill Parthian shamans on Freedomhill for Spirit's Tears.
Bring Spirit's Tears to Keezar's right hand.
"I'll just leave you to it, then."
"That's it? It's done?"
Ask Dandit if he's finished.
Use Keezar's "power glue" to fix the broken archdevan pendant.
Restored Archdevan Control Pendant.
"I know them. Thanks for your help!"
Show restored Archdevan Control Pendant to Dandit.
